description: This file defines a React component for a sidebar help/chat assistant called CopilotSidebar, including subcomponents for help content, tips, and navigation, with styling and dynamic behavior.

methods.name: HelpContent
methods.description: Component rendering contextual help sections based on current page.

methods.name: TipsContent
methods.description: Component providing tips relevant to the current page.

methods.name: NavigationContent
methods.description: Component offering navigation options and suggested next steps.
